attributes.action: abolish the unfair tax by local councils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to charge people for a parking permit to park their cars outside their own homes.Seeing as we have to pay tax on the purchase of the vehicle,road tax as well as a hefty amount on the fuel to run them, This is another tax to make more money for the local councils.

rejection.details: Please ammend the main sentence to reflect the aims of the petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
